Held senior and executive management management positions with large and small firmsâ€“ mainly, in the financial services, telecommunications, and enterprise software (SaaS) industries. Early in his career he ran large scale software development projects in the electronic banking area for Bank of America and then went on to founding (and running for 10 years) E-Fax Communications, one of the first ASPs to offer enterprise permission based email and fax marketing services.

Recently, served as VP of Marketing for an enterprise social networking/community SaaS provider and, as COO, turned around a troubled Web 2.0 company which was subsequently sold via a private equity transaction.

Has developed an expertise for running SaaS/ASP type firms, social networking, software development, and sales/marketing of enterprise business services.

Currently maintains an active consulting practice, routinely working with start-ups and established mid-market firms in the areas of financial management, brand loyalty, and sales growth.

Also currently exploring the use of social media technology for executive leadership at CallPress.com. Mr. Karwat is a director at iZoca.com and a Managing Partner with the Vertical Action Group.

Educational background includes a BA in Economics and an MBA in Finance.
